availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas McDonald Logan (Richland County, IL, witness)

body.p: Richland County, Illinois, farmer. Rush County, Indiana, native. Married to Charlotte Snodgrass Logan in 1851. Father of Reuben Logan, Merrett Logan, and Charlotte Logan. Farmer in Richland County, Illinois, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Richland County, Claremont, p. 108.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Harrison County, Jefferson, p. 53B.
"Death of T. M. C. Logan," Centralia Fireside Guard (Centralia, Missouri), August 28, 1903, p. 5.
KYR-0001-006-0001.
